channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Amazon Web Services Eyes US$100M Investment in Taiwan, Say Industry Insiders
item.description: Cloud computing giant Amazon Web Services is eyeing a US$100 million investment in Taiwan, according to industry insiders.

item.title: Beijing Resumes Kinmen Patrols Despite KMT China Trip
item.description: A group of Kuomintang lawmakers are being criticized for a goodwill trip to China, as Chinese patrols near Taiwan's outlying Kinmen Islands resume.

item.title: U.S. Officials Accuse China of Distorting U.N. Resolution for Geopolitical Gain
item.description: The U.N. passed Resolution 2758 in 1971, recognizing the People’s Republic of China in Beijing as the U.N.’s legitimate representative of China over Taipei. Now U.S. officials say

item.title: President-Elect Lai Meets With Japanese Lawmakers Ahead of Inauguration
item.description: President-elect Lai Ching-te has thanked Japan for its donations to Taiwan following a massive earthquake in early April. He made the comments when meeting with a visiting group of
